name: Countess Thalia Solitaire Lite
description:
Why play Solitaire alone, darling? As a member of the idle aristocracy, Countess Thalia has oodles of spare time to devote to games of Freecell, Klondike, and Yukon.

Her ladyship's best kept secret is how she wiggles the playable cards, saving you oh so much bothersome scanning. But careful, love, she is rather strict on protocol!

This is the free, ad supported 'Lite' version of Countess Thalia Solitaire. The full version is ad free and has a move undo option.
